mapper.sql: ID, TABLE_NAME, SCHEMA, APP_NAME, T_CLASS, PATTERN, BIZ_CODE, PREFIX, THE_DESC, IS_SYS, STATUS, UPDATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATETIME

select
from T_BIZ_TABLE_DEF where id = #{id, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update T_BIZ_TABLE_DEF
